headline: Roper to Acquire CentralReach, Expands in Healthcare Market
summary: ROP's acquisition of CentralReach will enable it to strengthen its product offerings and boost its Application Software segment.

headline: DAT expands business services with Copilot, DAT University
summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., March 25, 2025--DAT Freight & Analytics introduced two new services to help aspiring owner-operators and freight brokers launch and confidently grow their business.

raw.headline: DAT expands business services with Copilot, DAT University
raw.summary: BEAVERTON, Ore., March 25, 2025--DAT Freight & Analytics introduced two new services to help aspiring owner-operators and freight brokers launch and confidently grow their business.

headline: Roper Technologies to acquire CentralReach for net purchase price of $1.65B
summary: Roper Technologies (ROP) has reached a definitive agreement to acquire CentralReach from Insight Partners for a net purchase price of approximately $1.65B, including a $200 million tax benefit resulting from the transaction. Roper expects CentralReach to deliver sustainable 20%+ organic revenue and EBITDA growth. CentralReach is a provider of cloud-native software enabling the workflow and administration of Applied Behavior Analysis therapy. Over 200,000 professionals utilize CentralReach’s purp

headline: Roper Technologies signs agreement to acquire CentralReach for $1.65bn
summary: As part of the acquisition, CentralReach will remain independent, preserving its team, brands, products and mission.
